input_str:
It's a simple question. Why can't PC and console players play against each other if both own the same game? The answer of course, is quite complex.

Despite being a requested feature by gamers for years, the technical side of making this happen is a lot of work, and the differences in control schemes could give one side a large, un-fun advantage over the other. Valve once famously called the idea a "gimmick," and when it has
